Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui

package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCustomerWindow
    GUI pop-up used to add new Customers to the FlightBookingSystem
    AddFlightWindow
    GUI pop-up used to add new Flights to the FlightBookingSystem
    BookingsWindow
    GUI pop-up used to view Bookings for a given Customer through the FlightBookingSystem
    CancelBookingWindow
    GUI pop-up class used by the user to remove Bookings from the FlightBookingSystem
    DelCustomerWindow
    GUI pop-up class used by the user to remove Customers from view, and mark them as removed
    DelFlightWindow
    GUI pop-up class used by the user to remove Flights from view, and mark them as removed
    IssueBookingWindow
    GUI pop-up used to add new Bookings to the FlightBookingSystem
    MainWindow
    Main window used as the foundation for the GUI
    PassengersWindow
    GUI pop-up used to view Customers on a given Flight through the FlightBookingSystem
